DOC.detailed_description: Sleep apnea hypopnea syndrome ( SAHS ) prevalent disease significant morbidity result long waiting list high health care cost . Therefore , alternative cost-effective approach urgently need . A possible procedure telemedicine base ICT . The design study prospective , randomize , control , open parallel . A ICT-based hospital management SAHS implement compare classical in-hospital management . The main objective evaluation group analysis efficacy cost effectiveness two SAHS management program . This 3 month randomize , parallel group study . Participants patient suspicion SAHS derive Investigators ' Sleep Unit . Patients randomize two group ; 1 ) classical in-hospital group : polysomnography home respiratory polygraphy ( HRP ) , CPAP titration treatment hospital follow-up ; 2 ) ICT group : 3 consecutive HRPs , automatic CPAP treatment control phone/video conference data transmission use custom design platform .
